name: dotLottieR
summary: An iOS library to natively render .lottie files with the help of rLottie Library https://dotlottie.io/
description: dotLottieR is an open-source file format that aggregates one or more Lottie files and their associated resources into a single file. They are ZIP archives compressed with the Deflate compression method and carry the file extension of .lottie.
